Damage: 4D '''Capsule''': The PB-950 patrol boat, was a patrol craft which was produced by Corellian Engineering Corporation from around 300 years before the Galactic Civil War until shortly after the Clone Wars. With a sturdy double-hull design, the PB-950 was popular for its durability. The central section of the ship had two decks, with the control areas on the upper deck and the lower deck containing cargo and maintenance bays. A number of pirates acquired PB-950 patrol boats for illegal purposes, using their stock ion cannons to disable target vessels. Though it was phased out of production in favor of the more powerful Light Corvette, tens of thousands of PB-950s were known to be in use throughout the Galactic Empire. The Corellians employed these craft during the original Corellian Crisis.
